body_html:
It is dynamically loaded as dll here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_python.cmake#L879
but also statically linked here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L66

The fix is to add it to the exclusion list (like gru for example)
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L135

I can send a PR tomorrow (want to make sure the unit tests work for this since this might have never worked on windows)

body:
It is dynamically loaded as dll here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_python.cmake#L879
but also statically linked here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L66

The fix is to add it to the exclusion list (like gru for example)
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/cmake/tf_core_kernels.cmake#L135

I can send a PR tomorrow (want to make sure the unit tests work for this since this might have never worked on windows)
